requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 (VRAM 128MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750Ti (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck compatible
